BEAst: Global Trade Item Number (T0154), GTIN for Consumer unit (T6225), NOBB Article Number (T6027), RT Article Number (T6460), TUN Article Number (T6028), Finfo Vilma Article Number (T6029), RSK Article Number Norwegian (T6024), RSK Article Number Sweden (T6023), E-number Norwegian (T6026), E-number (T0260) or SGTIN (T6461). schemeID defines which of the different types it is. BEAst: SBMI Number (T0172:01), SÅ Number (T0172:02), Concrete Number (T0172:04), Waste Number (T0172:07), Fuel Number (T0172:08), Product Type GUID (T6441), Identity Type Code (T6440), Product Type Description (T6442), Customer's Reference Number (T6005), Seller's OrderLine Number (T6462), Offer Number (T6010), OfferLine Number (T6459) or GUID OfferLine (T6486). listID is always "ZZZ" and name describes what is in Item Classification Code. Possible values are: "SBMINumber", "SÅNumber", "ConcreteNumber", "WasteNumber", "FuelNumber", "IdentityTypeCode", "ProductTypeGUID", "ProductTypeDescription", "CustomersReferenceNumber", "SellersOrderLineNumber", "OfferNumber", "OfferLineNumber" and "GUIDOfferLine". Peppol:
